name: main_description
label: Main description
default: You may be looking for opportunities to upskill, gain employment or watch a game, shop, play and interact. This will no longer be something that only one person does. You won't need a new standalone app or travel to a stadium or find new ways to access different components of what interests you. What you want will be found on a single platform.

children.name: description
children.label: Description
children.default: Where immediacy of use and interactivity of content will directly contribute to your enjoyment, allow you to connect globally and profit in your love for the sport.

default.title: This platform is ZujuGP.
